---
title: "About me"
description: |
  I'm an assistant professor at [LEDa, Université Paris-Dauphine](https://leda.dauphine.fr/) in Paris, France. I work on **economics relevant to climate change**. In particular, I am interested in estimating climate change impacts, assessing adaptation options and designing optimal mitigation policies, mostly by using applied modeling tools. I co-organize the [Dauphine economics seminar](https://leda.dauphine.fr/fr/seminaire-externe/seminaire-leda.html).

## Employment and education

* **2017-2021** PhD candidate at [Paris-Saclay Applied Economics (PSAE)](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/economie_publique). Advisor: Stéphane De Cara
